unnormalised: Hey, any updates on Virat's hamstring injury? Heard it happened on 20/08/2024 during the Asia Cup practice in Colombo. Is Bumrah fit after that niggle around 17:00 hrs yesterday? Hope he's ready for the match against Pakistan on 28/08/2024. Also, what about Hardik's back? Last I heard it was being treated at the NCA. Wishing them a speedy recovery, Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey, any updates on Virats hamstring injury? Heard it happened on twentieth august two thousand and twenty four during the Asia Cup practice in Colombo. Is Bumrah fit after that niggle around five P M yesterday? Hope he is ready for the match against Pakistan on twenty eighth august two thousand and twenty four. Also, what about Hardiks back? Last I heard it was being treated at the N C A. Wishing them a speedy recovery, Jai Hind!
